title: 12/21/21 DPS Hour 1
itunes:title: 12/21/21 DPS Hour 1
description:
Dan talks about the NFL and how hits on the knees of a wide receiver should not be a legal hit. Dan says he agrees with Tom Brady on this issue.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
